Which would be the greater evil? To deceive millions into a deluded, blissful life of supposed happiness and joy causing this multitude to miss out on the 'sins' of this world or to let a potential truth destroy millions of faith and hope letting the be over ruled with passions and lust??? Just thought I would play a little bit of a devil's advocate here.

Would you mind trying that again? What you seem to be asking is, is it better to lie to people and have them be happy, or tell the truth and have them have sex. But you obviously have some deeper question. Please, be a bit more direct.
Why have you obviously biased the choices by making one sound worse than the other?
I'm not sure that any "evil" is specified here: in fact the opening statement is so confused, I'm not sure that any proposition(s) whatever can be inferred from it.

The "greater evil" of wich you speak, is obviously a matter of opinion. We are brought up to know the meaning of good, or bad, but if these childhood morals are misguided, perhaps by corupt parents or, the lack of parents at all, then the meaning of good or bad is misguided and must be learned from the individuals perspective. Therefore, there can not be a great evil, nor a greater good, only opinionated questions and answers.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The Greater Evil???
